denver.data¶

A DenverDataSource class.

build_corpus()[source]¶

Get a Corpus dataset same as Corpus in Flair

Returns

corpus: A Corpus dataset same as Corpus in Flair .

build_databunch(batch_size=128, mini_batch_chunk_size=10, pct=0.2, seed=42, num_workers=1)[source]¶

Build DataBunch for classifier

Parameters

  • (int) (batch_size) – Batch size

  • mini_batch_chunk_size (int) – If mini-batches are larger than this number, they get broken down into chunks of this size for processing purposes

  • pct (int) – The percent for valid set

  • seed (int) – The number of seed

Returns

A DataBunch type same as in FastAI

convert_to_bio_file(data, out_file='train.txt')[source]¶

Convert Dataframe to BIO-format and save to temporal file with name is temp_output.txt.

classmethod from_csv(train_path=None, test_path=None, text_col=None, label_col=None, intent_col=None, tag_col=None, lowercase=True, rm_emoji=False, rm_url=False, rm_special_token=False, balance=False, size=None, replace=False, shuffle=False)[source]¶

Get DenverDataLoaders from file .csv format

Parameters

  • train_path (Union[str, Path, None]) – The path to train data

  • test_path (Union[str, Path, None]) – The path to test data

  • text_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column name of text data

  • label_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column name of label data

  • intent_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column specify the label of intent with jointly task IC and NER

  • tag_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column specify the label of tagging with jointly task IC NER NER

  • lowercase (bool) – If True, lowercase data

  • rm_emoji (bool) – If True, replace the emoji token into <space> (” “)

  • rm_url (bool) – If True, replace the url token into <space> (” “)

  • rm_special_token (bool) – If True, replace the special token into <space> (” “), special token included of punctuation token, characters without vietnamese characters

  • balance (bool) – If True, balance train data

  • size (Optional[int]) – Number of items to sampling

  • replace (bool) – Allow or disallow sampling of the same row more than once

  • shuffle (bool) – If True, shuffle data

classmethod from_df(train_df=None, test_df=None, text_col=None, label_col=None, intent_col=None, tag_col=None, lowercase=True, rm_emoji=False, rm_url=False, rm_special_token=False, balance=False, size=None, replace=False, shuffle=False)[source]¶

Get DenverDataLoaders from DataFrame

Parameters

  • train_df (Optional[DataFrame]) – A DataFrame

  • test_df (Optional[DataFrame]) – A DataFrame

  • text_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column name of text data

  • label_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column name of label data

  • intent_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column specify the label of intent with jointly task IC and NER

  • tag_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column specify the label of tagging with jointly task IC NER NER

  • lowercase (bool) – If True, lowercase data

  • rm_emoji (bool) – If True, replace the emoji token into <space> (” “)

  • rm_url (bool) – If True, replace the url token into <space> (” “)

  • rm_special_token (bool) – If True, replace the special token into <space> (” “), special token included of punctuation token, characters without vietnamese characters

  • balance (bool) – If True, balance train data

  • size (Optional[int]) – Number of the sampled items

  • replace (bool) – Allow or disallow sampling of the same row more than once

  • shuffle (bool) – If True, shuffle data

Normalize text data frame

Parameters

  • lowercase – If True, lowercase data

  • rm_emoji – If True, replace the emoji token into <space> (” “)

  • rm_url – If True, replace the url token into <space> (” “)

  • rm_special_token – If True, replace the special token into <space> (” “)

Returns

A dataframe after normalized.

denver.data.preprocess¶

class denver.data.preprocess.BalanceLearn[source]¶

Bases: object

Balancing data for a DataFrame

classmethod subtext_sampling(data, size=None, label_col='label', replace=False)[source]¶

Balancing a dataframe

Parameters

  • data (Union[str, Path, DataFrame]) – A dataframe or a path to the .csv file.

  • size (Optional[int]) – Number of items to sampling.

  • label_col (str) – The column of a dataframe to sampling data follow it.

  • replace (bool) – Allow or disallow sampling of the same row more than once.

denver.data.preprocess.normalize(text, rm_emoji=False, rm_url=False, lowercase=False, rm_special_token=False)[source]¶

Function to normalize text

Parameters

  • text – The text to normalize

  • lowercase (bool) – If True, lowercase data

  • rm_emoji (bool) – If True, replace the emoji token into <space> (” “)

  • rm_url (bool) – If True, replace the url token into <space> (” “)

  • rm_special_token (bool) – If True, replace the special token into <space> (” “)

Returns

txt: The text after normalize.

denver.data.preprocess.split_data(data, pct=0.1, is_stratify=False, text_col='text', label_col='intent', seed=123, *kwargs)[source]¶

Function to split data into train and test set follow as the pct value

Parameters

  • data (DataFrame) – A data DataFrame

  • pct (float) – The ratio to split train/test set

  • is_stratify (bool) – If True, data is split in a stratified fashion, using this as the class labels.

Returns

train_df: A train DataFrame dataset

Returns

test_df: A test DataFrame dataset

Standardize a dataframe following the standardization format.

Parameters

  • text_col (Union[int, str]) – The column name of text data

  • label_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column name of label data

  • intent_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column specify the label of intent with jointly task IC and NER

  • tag_col (Union[int, str, None]) – The column specify the label of tagging with jointly task IC NER NER

Returns

df: A standardized DataFrame
